coffee.name: Wildfire
coffee.description: A bold and smoky blend with notes of dark chocolate and molasses.

coffee.name: Walnut Wonder
coffee.description: A smooth and nutty coffee from the slopes of South America.

coffee.name: Indo-Viet Roast
coffee.description: This coffee blend is made from beans sourced from Indonesia and Vietnam. It is a medium-dark roast coffee with a spicy and earthy flavor profile, with notes of cinnamon and clove. It is perfect for drip and French press brewing methods.

coffee.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
coffee.description: A light and fruity coffee with notes of blueberry and citrus. Grown in the highlands of Ethiopia, this coffee is sure to brighten up your morning.

coffee.name: Andean Almond
coffee.description: A smooth and mellow coffee from the mountains of South America, with hints of almond and toffee.

coffee.name: Coconut Kiss
coffee.description: A light and refreshing coffee from the shores of the Asia Pacific, with a subtle coconut flavor.

coffee.name: Arabian Nights
coffee.description: A bold and spicy coffee from the Middle East, with notes of cardamom and cinnamon.

coffee.name: Himalayan Heights
coffee.description: Grown on the steep slopes of the Himalayan Mountains, this coffee is known for its bright acidity and delicate floral notes. This light roast is perfect for those who prefer a more delicate flavor profile.

coffee.name: Bali Bliss
coffee.description: Escape to the tropical paradise of Bali with this smooth and mellow blend. Grown on small family farms, this coffee is shade-grown and hand-picked for a rich and nuanced flavor profile. Notes of milk chocolate, hazelnut, and a hint of tropical fruit.

coffee.name: Central Perk
coffee.description: A medium roast coffee with a smooth, nutty flavor and a hint of caramel. Inspired by your favorite coffee shop!
